thread.section_title: US News, Breaking News and Headlines - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: The Next Big Thing in Urban Transit: Fast-Bus Systems

author: Arian Campo-Flores
title: The Next Big Thing in Urban Transit: Fast-Bus Systems
text:
After years of unsuccessful efforts to create a light-rail system in Florida’s Tampa Bay area, transit leaders are falling back on an old technology—buses.
This isn’t your average city bus. The service, known as bus rapid transit, would operate for long stretches on dedicated lanes and feature modern, comfortable vehicles and raised station platforms level with bus entrances for smooth boarding.
Officials...
